root.name: Microsoft Train Simulator
root.description: About Microsoft Train SimulatorMicrosoft train simulator was developed by Microsoft and Kuju Entertainment to give players the chance to operate 11 highly realistic trains though different scenarios from beginner to expert. The game features some 600 miles of meticulously re-crated track spanning over 3 continents. The game also features a editor that lets play make custom customize several features of the game including new routes, locos, and scenarios. A huge community of content makers have emerged with both free and paid for content.
